reviewText: I airbrush and this dvd has shown me some good tips on creating a very detailed portrait. how to use razors and different erasers for highlights. I know my portraits will improve he actually talks through the process, not only watching him paint. I really liked it.

The Amazon description was skimpy and I didn't realise the 'painting' was airbrushing (which I'm not into).

The DVD did seem to be good for those using that medium however.
